name: poke-doll
effect: Used in battle : Ends a wild battle. Cannot be used in trainer battles.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A doll that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A doll that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.
